formula: G.f.: (G(x)^2+H(x))/2 where G(x) = Sum_{k>=0} k!*x^k and G(x) = Sum_{k>=0} k!^2*x^(2*k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 22 2007
maple: a:=proc(n) options operator, arrow: factorial(n)*(sum(1/binomial(n, k), k= 0.. floor((1/2)*n))) end proc: seq(a(n), n=0..21); - _Emeric Deutsch_, Oct 11 2007
author: _Clark Kimberling_
